verses.verse: Let us <WG5399> therefore <WG3767> fear <WG5399>, lest <WG3379>, a promise <WG1860> being left <WG2641> behind by us of entering <WG1525> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, any <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> should seem <WG1380> to come short of it <WG5302>.

Again <WG3825>, he declares <WG3724> a certain <WG5100> day <WG2250>, saying <WG3004> in <WG1722> David <WG1138>, To day <WG4594>, after <WG3326> so long <WG5118> a time <WG5550>; as <WG2531> it is said <WG2046>, To day <WG4594> if <WG1437> you will hear <WG191> his <WG846> voice <WG5456>, harden <WG4645> not <WG3361> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>.

There remains <WG620> therefore <WG686> a rest <WG4520> to the people <WG2992> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> he that is entered <WG1525> into <WG1519> his <WG846> rest <WG2663>, he <WG846> also <WG2532> has ceased <WG2664> from <WG575> his own <WG2398> works <WG2041>, as <WG5618> God <WG2316> did from <WG575> his <WG846>.
